TopicTitle: The Official Kerbin Cup Tournament Thread - Final Entries Posted

Edited June 19, 2014 by Tw1
Quoting deleted post.
I don't know what just happened, but I had to get rid of a few posts. While this is a competition, please remember that this is also supposed to be fun. Keep your spirits up, everyone
Darn, my post got deleted, and I lost my insta-link! Whelp, this will do.

Rowsdower I am planning on starting another, ongoing community cup/bracket with each winning trophy being named after a planet/moon (from inside to outside order of bodies). Do I have your support? The reason I'm hesitant at all is because I doubt people would compete if it was unofficial or just the forum. Are you all cool with starting a forum competition of this same sort and also would you be willing to help with community reach of it? Here's the rules I've thought up so far:

Page currently used/based from:Kerbin Cup Unofficial Team Blog for Unofficial Teams

Rules brainstormed:

1. Teams of four

2. Flags/icon is highly suggested

3. All teams listed will be competing. Team with least votes will be voted out of winners, though playing is still completely fine.

They just won't earn the trophy (which someone will need to design in paint/KSP).

4. Challenge announced Monday, submissions due by Friday. Cut team will be announced as new challenge is announced.

5. Mods allowed for each challenge will be announced as challenge is (I.E. Stock/No hyperedit/no Mechjeb or Kerbal Engineer/no non-part plugins/...ect.
In the spirit of cooperation and competition, I'm just going to leave this here
hahaha, awesome!

when is the deadline?

just to be sure, I know it's somewhere in this posts, Friday, but I don't know the hour!

As I wasn't able to enter the Kerbal Cup in time, I'm making my own little team...

Introducing...

Blinded with Science!

...is it all right if I have my own little thread on the General Discussion? I don't claim to be doing anything official, nor do I have any intention of beating any other team. I'm just doing this to show my responses to this excellent challenge idea.

when is the deadline?

just to be sure, I know it's somewhere in this posts, Friday, but I don't know the hour!

Friday at 6PM, Central Daylight Time. We got time, m1 calm down. XD

MUST.TAKE.PERFECT.PICTURE.!!!!!!!

=)
Don't forget all of you who aren't running officially to post your pictures (if you did it) in the unofficial team listings! I'll be running a poll for all the unofficial teams.

As I wasn't able to enter the Kerbal Cup in time, I'm making my own little team...

Introducing...

...is it all right if I have my own little thread on the General Discussion? I don't claim to be doing anything official, nor do I have any intention of beating any other team. I'm just doing this to show my responses to this excellent challenge idea.

A few posters in this thread are organizing another tournament, preferably to take place at the conclusion of this one. Get in touch with them if you'd like to participate
